title: Ulysses
author: James Joyce
annotation: Ulysses chronicles the passage of Leopold Bloom through Dublin during an ordinary day, June 16, 1904.

title: Don Quixote
author: Miguel de Cervantes
annotation: Alonso Quixano, a retired country gentleman in his fifties, lives in an unnamed section of La Mancha with his niece and a housekeeper.

title: Hamlet
author: William Shakespeare
annotation: The Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark.
